metadata.description: "GOLDEN CHILD" PART 1.  When Cerebro detects Paul Patterson, a student attending Peter Parker's school who has developed mutant powers -- it sets Wolverine and Spider-Man on the same path.  But with competing agendas, will they work together?  Will they be at odds?  Hard to say... but the title doesn't say "Super Friends," gang!
metadata.name: Marvel Team-Up
